title: Sugar
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your main boy
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your play toy
[Verse 1]
Got no time for every woman
Thinking that she's looking fine
Got no pockets full of money, no, no, no
A fox would just be wasting her time
[Pre-Chorus]
All I got is good, good lovin'
Yeah, good loving is hard to find, hey
[Chorus]
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your main boy
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your play toy
[Post-Chorus]
Get it baby
Hey
Mhm, yeah

[Verse 2]
Got no need for fancy places
Got no need for cannon and wine, ah
Got no need to move to the city, no, no, no
Got no need to walk the line
[Pre-Chorus]
All I need is good home cooking
And some sugar after suppertime, hey
[Chorus]
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your main boy
Sugar, Sugar
How I wanna be your play toy
[Outro]
Ooh Sugar
Ooh Sugar
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, Sugar
Ooh Sugar
Ooh Sugar
Ooh ooh ooh, hey, yeah yeah yeah, baby
Ooh Sugar, oh yeah
Ooh Sugar, oh yeah
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh Sugar
Ooh Sugar, oh yeah
Ooh Sugar, oh yeah
Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh Sugar
Ooh Sugar, oh yeah (Hey yeah yeah)
Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
